00001 
00002 # Emitter expects events obeying the following grammar:
00003 # stream ::= STREAM-START document* STREAM-END
00004 # document ::= DOCUMENT-START node DOCUMENT-END
00005 # node ::= SCALAR | sequence | mapping
00006 # sequence ::= SEQUENCE-START node* SEQUENCE-END
00007 # mapping ::= MAPPING-START (node node)* MAPPING-END
00008 
00009 __all__ = ['Emitter', 'EmitterError']
00010 
00011 from error import YAMLError
00012 from events import *
00013 
00014 import re
00015 
00016 class EmitterError(YAMLError):
00017     pass
00018 
00019 class ScalarAnalysis(object):
00020     def __init__(self, scalar, empty, multiline,
00021             allow_flow_plain, allow_block_plain,
00022             allow_single_quoted, allow_double_quoted,
00023             allow_block):
00024         self.scalar = scalar
00025         self.empty = empty
00026         self.multiline = multiline
00027         self.allow_flow_plain = allow_flow_plain
00028         self.allow_block_plain = allow_block_plain
00029         self.allow_single_quoted = allow_single_quoted
00030         self.allow_double_quoted = allow_double_quoted
00031         self.allow_block = allow_block
00032 
00033 class Emitter(object):
00034 
00035     DEFAULT_TAG_PREFIXES = {
00036         u'!' : u'!',
00037         u'tag:yaml.org,2002:' : u'!!',
00038     }
00039 
00040     def __init__(self, stream, canonical=None, indent=None, width=None,
00041             allow_unicode=None, line_break=None):
00042 
00043         # The stream should have the methods `write` and possibly `flush`.
00044         self.stream = stream
00045 
00046         # Encoding can be overriden by STREAM-START.
00047         self.encoding = None
00048 
00049         # Emitter is a state machine with a stack of states to handle nested
00050         # structures.
00051         self.states = []
00052         self.state = self.expect_stream_start
00053 
00054         # Current event and the event queue.
00055         self.events = []
00056         self.event = None
00057 
00058         # The current indentation level and the stack of previous indents.
00059         self.indents = []
00060         self.indent = None
00061 
00062         # Flow level.
00063         self.flow_level = 0
00064 
00065         # Contexts.
00066         self.root_context = False
00067         self.sequence_context = False
00068         self.mapping_context = False
00069         self.simple_key_context = False
00070 
00071         # Characteristics of the last emitted character:
00072         #  - current position.
00073         #  - is it a whitespace?
00074         #  - is it an indention character
00075         #    (indentation space, '-', '?', or ':')?
00076         self.line = 0
00077         self.column = 0
00078         self.whitespace = True
00079         self.indention = True
00080 
00081         # Formatting details.
00082         self.canonical = canonical
00083         self.allow_unicode = allow_unicode
00084         self.best_indent = 2
00085         if indent and 1 < indent < 10:
00086             self.best_indent = indent
00087         self.best_width = 80
00088         if width and width > self.best_indent*2:
00089             self.best_width = width
00090         self.best_line_break = u'\n'
00091         if line_break in [u'\r', u'\n', u'\r\n']:
00092             self.best_line_break = line_break
00093 
00094         # Tag prefixes.
00095         self.tag_prefixes = None
00096 
00097         # Prepared anchor and tag.
00098         self.prepared_anchor = None
00099         self.prepared_tag = None
00100 
00101         # Scalar analysis and style.
00102         self.analysis = None
00103         self.style = None
00104 
00105     def emit(self, event):
00106         self.events.append(event)
00107         while not self.need_more_events():
00108             self.event = self.events.pop(0)
00109             self.state()
00110             self.event = None
00111 
00112     # In some cases, we wait for a few next events before emitting.
00113 
00114     def need_more_events(self):
00115         if not self.events:
00116             return True
00117         event = self.events[0]
00118         if isinstance(event, DocumentStartEvent):
00119             return self.need_events(1)
00120         elif isinstance(event, SequenceStartEvent):
00121             return self.need_events(2)
00122         elif isinstance(event, MappingStartEvent):
00123             return self.need_events(3)
00124         else:
00125             return False
00126 
00127     def need_events(self, count):
00128         level = 0
00129         for event in self.events[1:]:
00130             if isinstance(event, (DocumentStartEvent, CollectionStartEvent)):
00131                 level += 1
00132             elif isinstance(event, (DocumentEndEvent, CollectionEndEvent)):
00133                 level -= 1
00134             elif isinstance(event, StreamEndEvent):
00135                 level = -1
00136             if level < 0:
00137                 return False
00138         return (len(self.events) < count+1)
00139 
00140     def increase_indent(self, flow=False, indentless=False):
00141         self.indents.append(self.indent)
00142         if self.indent is None:
00143             if flow:
00144                 self.indent = self.best_indent
00145             else:
00146                 self.indent = 0
00147         elif not indentless:
00148             self.indent += self.best_indent
00149 
00150     # States.
00151 
00152     # Stream handlers.
00153 
00154     def expect_stream_start(self):
00155         if isinstance(self.event, StreamStartEvent):
00156             if self.event.encoding:
00157                 self.encoding = self.event.encoding
00158             self.write_stream_start()
00159             self.state = self.expect_first_document_start
00160         else:
00161             raise EmitterError("expected StreamStartEvent, but got %s"
00162                     % self.event)
00163 
00164     def expect_nothing(self):
00165         raise EmitterError("expected nothing, but got %s" % self.event)
00166 
00167     # Document handlers.
00168 
00169     def expect_first_document_start(self):
00170         return self.expect_document_start(first=True)
00171 
00172     def expect_document_start(self, first=False):
00173         if isinstance(self.event, DocumentStartEvent):
00174             if self.event.version:
00175                 version_text = self.prepare_version(self.event.version)
00176                 self.write_version_directive(version_text)
00177             self.tag_prefixes = self.DEFAULT_TAG_PREFIXES.copy()
00178             if self.event.tags:
00179                 handles = self.event.tags.keys()
00180                 handles.sort()
00181                 for handle in handles:
00182                     prefix = self.event.tags[handle]
00183                     self.tag_prefixes[prefix] = handle
00184                     handle_text = self.prepare_tag_handle(handle)
00185                     prefix_text = self.prepare_tag_prefix(prefix)
00186                     self.write_tag_directive(handle_text, prefix_text)
00187             implicit = (first and not self.event.explicit and not self.canonical
00188                     and not self.event.version and not self.event.tags
00189                     and not self.check_empty_document())
00190             if not implicit:
00191                 self.write_indent()
00192                 self.write_indicator(u'---', True)
00193                 if self.canonical:
00194                     self.write_indent()
00195             self.state = self.expect_document_root
00196         elif isinstance(self.event, StreamEndEvent):
00197             self.write_stream_end()
00198             self.state = self.expect_nothing
00199         else:
00200             raise EmitterError("expected DocumentStartEvent, but got %s"
00201                     % self.event)
00202 
00203     def expect_document_end(self):
00204         if isinstance(self.event, DocumentEndEvent):
00205             self.write_indent()
00206             if self.event.explicit:
00207                 self.write_indicator(u'...', True)
00208                 self.write_indent()
00209             self.flush_stream()
00210             self.state = self.expect_document_start
00211         else:
00212             raise EmitterError("expected DocumentEndEvent, but got %s"
00213                     % self.event)
00214 
00215     def expect_document_root(self):
00216         self.states.append(self.expect_document_end)
00217         self.expect_node(root=True)
00218 
00219     # Node handlers.
00220 
00221     def expect_node(self, root=False, sequence=False, mapping=False,
00222             simple_key=False):
00223         self.root_context = root
00224         self.sequence_context = sequence
00225         self.mapping_context = mapping
00226         self.simple_key_context = simple_key
00227         if isinstance(self.event, AliasEvent):
00228             self.expect_alias()
00229         elif isinstance(self.event, (ScalarEvent, CollectionStartEvent)):
00230             self.process_anchor(u'&')
00231             self.process_tag()
00232             if isinstance(self.event, ScalarEvent):
00233                 self.expect_scalar()
00234             elif isinstance(self.event, SequenceStartEvent):
00235                 if self.flow_level or self.canonical or self.event.flow_style   \
00236                         or self.check_empty_sequence():
00237                     self.expect_flow_sequence()
00238                 else:
00239                     self.expect_block_sequence()
00240             elif isinstance(self.event, MappingStartEvent):
00241                 if self.flow_level or self.canonical or self.event.flow_style   \
00242                         or self.check_empty_mapping():
00243                     self.expect_flow_mapping()
00244                 else:
00245                     self.expect_block_mapping()
00246         else:
00247             raise EmitterError("expected NodeEvent, but got %s" % self.event)
00248 
00249     def expect_alias(self):
00250         if self.event.anchor is None:
00251             raise EmitterError("anchor is not specified for alias")
00252         self.process_anchor(u'*')
00253         self.state = self.states.pop()
00254 
00255     def expect_scalar(self):
00256         self.increase_indent(flow=True)
00257         self.process_scalar()
00258         self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00259         self.state = self.states.pop()
00260 
00261     # Flow sequence handlers.
00262 
00263     def expect_flow_sequence(self):
00264         self.write_indicator(u'[', True, whitespace=True)
00265         self.flow_level += 1
00266         self.increase_indent(flow=True)
00267         self.state = self.expect_first_flow_sequence_item
00268 
00269     def expect_first_flow_sequence_item(self):
00270         if isinstance(self.event, SequenceEndEvent):
00271             self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00272             self.flow_level -= 1
00273             self.write_indicator(u']', False)
00274             self.state = self.states.pop()
00275         else:
00276             if self.canonical or self.column > self.best_width:
00277                 self.write_indent()
00278             self.states.append(self.expect_flow_sequence_item)
00279             self.expect_node(sequence=True)
00280 
00281     def expect_flow_sequence_item(self):
00282         if isinstance(self.event, SequenceEndEvent):
00283             self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00284             self.flow_level -= 1
00285             if self.canonical:
00286                 self.write_indicator(u',', False)
00287                 self.write_indent()
00288             self.write_indicator(u']', False)
00289             self.state = self.states.pop()
00290         else:
00291             self.write_indicator(u',', False)
00292             if self.canonical or self.column > self.best_width:
00293                 self.write_indent()
00294             self.states.append(self.expect_flow_sequence_item)
00295             self.expect_node(sequence=True)
00296 
00297     # Flow mapping handlers.
00298 
00299     def expect_flow_mapping(self):
00300         self.write_indicator(u'{', True, whitespace=True)
00301         self.flow_level += 1
00302         self.increase_indent(flow=True)
00303         self.state = self.expect_first_flow_mapping_key
00304 
00305     def expect_first_flow_mapping_key(self):
00306         if isinstance(self.event, MappingEndEvent):
00307             self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00308             self.flow_level -= 1
00309             self.write_indicator(u'}', False)
00310             self.state = self.states.pop()
00311         else:
00312             if self.canonical or self.column > self.best_width:
00313                 self.write_indent()
00314             if not self.canonical and self.check_simple_key():
00315                 self.states.append(self.expect_flow_mapping_simple_value)
00316                 self.expect_node(mapping=True, simple_key=True)
00317             else:
00318                 self.write_indicator(u'?', True)
00319                 self.states.append(self.expect_flow_mapping_value)
00320                 self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00321 
00322     def expect_flow_mapping_key(self):
00323         if isinstance(self.event, MappingEndEvent):
00324             self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00325             self.flow_level -= 1
00326             if self.canonical:
00327                 self.write_indicator(u',', False)
00328                 self.write_indent()
00329             self.write_indicator(u'}', False)
00330             self.state = self.states.pop()
00331         else:
00332             self.write_indicator(u',', False)
00333             if self.canonical or self.column > self.best_width:
00334                 self.write_indent()
00335             if not self.canonical and self.check_simple_key():
00336                 self.states.append(self.expect_flow_mapping_simple_value)
00337                 self.expect_node(mapping=True, simple_key=True)
00338             else:
00339                 self.write_indicator(u'?', True)
00340                 self.states.append(self.expect_flow_mapping_value)
00341                 self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00342 
00343     def expect_flow_mapping_simple_value(self):
00344         self.write_indicator(u':', False)
00345         self.states.append(self.expect_flow_mapping_key)
00346         self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00347 
00348     def expect_flow_mapping_value(self):
00349         if self.canonical or self.column > self.best_width:
00350             self.write_indent()
00351         self.write_indicator(u':', True)
00352         self.states.append(self.expect_flow_mapping_key)
00353         self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00354 
00355     # Block sequence handlers.
00356 
00357     def expect_block_sequence(self):
00358         indentless = (self.mapping_context and not self.indention)
00359         self.increase_indent(flow=False, indentless=indentless)
00360         self.state = self.expect_first_block_sequence_item
00361 
00362     def expect_first_block_sequence_item(self):
00363         return self.expect_block_sequence_item(first=True)
00364 
00365     def expect_block_sequence_item(self, first=False):
00366         if not first and isinstance(self.event, SequenceEndEvent):
00367             self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00368             self.state = self.states.pop()
00369         else:
00370             self.write_indent()
00371             self.write_indicator(u'-', True, indention=True)
00372             self.states.append(self.expect_block_sequence_item)
00373             self.expect_node(sequence=True)
00374 
00375     # Block mapping handlers.
00376 
00377     def expect_block_mapping(self):
00378         self.increase_indent(flow=False)
00379         self.state = self.expect_first_block_mapping_key
00380 
00381     def expect_first_block_mapping_key(self):
00382         return self.expect_block_mapping_key(first=True)
00383 
00384     def expect_block_mapping_key(self, first=False):
00385         if not first and isinstance(self.event, MappingEndEvent):
00386             self.indent = self.indents.pop()
00387             self.state = self.states.pop()
00388         else:
00389             self.write_indent()
00390             if self.check_simple_key():
00391                 self.states.append(self.expect_block_mapping_simple_value)
00392                 self.expect_node(mapping=True, simple_key=True)
00393             else:
00394                 self.write_indicator(u'?', True, indention=True)
00395                 self.states.append(self.expect_block_mapping_value)
00396                 self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00397 
00398     def expect_block_mapping_simple_value(self):
00399         self.write_indicator(u':', False)
00400         self.states.append(self.expect_block_mapping_key)
00401         self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00402 
00403     def expect_block_mapping_value(self):
00404         self.write_indent()
00405         self.write_indicator(u':', True, indention=True)
00406         self.states.append(self.expect_block_mapping_key)
00407         self.expect_node(mapping=True)
00408 
00409     # Checkers.
00410 
00411     def check_empty_sequence(self):
00412         return (isinstance(self.event, SequenceStartEvent) and self.events
00413                 and isinstance(self.events[0], SequenceEndEvent))
00414 
00415     def check_empty_mapping(self):
00416         return (isinstance(self.event, MappingStartEvent) and self.events
00417                 and isinstance(self.events[0], MappingEndEvent))
00418 
00419     def check_empty_document(self):
00420         if not isinstance(self.event, DocumentStartEvent) or not self.events:
00421             return False
00422         event = self.events[0]
00423         return (isinstance(event, ScalarEvent) and event.anchor is None
00424                 and event.tag is None and event.implicit and event.value == u'')
00425 
00426     def check_simple_key(self):
00427         length = 0
00428         if isinstance(self.event, NodeEvent) and self.event.anchor is not None:
00429             if self.prepared_anchor is None:
00430                 self.prepared_anchor = self.prepare_anchor(self.event.anchor)
00431             length += len(self.prepared_anchor)
00432         if isinstance(self.event, (ScalarEvent, CollectionStartEvent))  \
00433                 and self.event.tag is not None:
00434             if self.prepared_tag is None:
00435                 self.prepared_tag = self.prepare_tag(self.event.tag)
00436             length += len(self.prepared_tag)
00437         if isinstance(self.event, ScalarEvent):
00438             if self.analysis is None:
00439                 self.analysis = self.analyze_scalar(self.event.value)
00440             length += len(self.analysis.scalar)
00441         return (length < 128 and (isinstance(self.event, AliasEvent)
00442             or (isinstance(self.event, ScalarEvent)
00443                     and not self.analysis.empty and not self.analysis.multiline)
00444             or self.check_empty_sequence() or self.check_empty_mapping()))
00445 
00446     # Anchor, Tag, and Scalar processors.
00447 
00448     def process_anchor(self, indicator):
00449         if self.event.anchor is None:
00450             self.prepared_anchor = None
00451             return
00452         if self.prepared_anchor is None:
00453             self.prepared_anchor = self.prepare_anchor(self.event.anchor)
00454         if self.prepared_anchor:
00455             self.write_indicator(indicator+self.prepared_anchor, True)
00456         self.prepared_anchor = None
00457 
00458     def process_tag(self):
00459         tag = self.event.tag
00460         if isinstance(self.event, ScalarEvent):
00461             if self.style is None:
00462                 self.style = self.choose_scalar_style()
00463             if ((not self.canonical or tag is None) and
00464                 ((self.style == '' and self.event.implicit[0])
00465                         or (self.style != '' and self.event.implicit[1]))):
00466                 self.prepared_tag = None
00467                 return
00468             if self.event.implicit[0] and tag is None:
00469                 tag = u'!'
00470                 self.prepared_tag = None
00471         else:
00472             if (not self.canonical or tag is None) and self.event.implicit:
00473                 self.prepared_tag = None
00474                 return
00475         if tag is None:
00476             raise EmitterError("tag is not specified")
00477         if self.prepared_tag is None:
00478             self.prepared_tag = self.prepare_tag(tag)
00479         if self.prepared_tag:
00480             self.write_indicator(self.prepared_tag, True)
00481         self.prepared_tag = None
00482 
00483     def choose_scalar_style(self):
00484         if self.analysis is None:
00485             self.analysis = self.analyze_scalar(self.event.value)
00486         if self.event.style == '"' or self.canonical:
00487             return '"'
00488         if not self.event.style and self.event.implicit[0]:
00489             if (not (self.simple_key_context and
00490                     (self.analysis.empty or self.analysis.multiline))
00491                 and (self.flow_level and self.analysis.allow_flow_plain
00492                     or (not self.flow_level and self.analysis.allow_block_plain))):
00493                 return ''
00494         if self.event.style and self.event.style in '|>':
00495             if (not self.flow_level and not self.simple_key_context
00496                     and self.analysis.allow_block):
00497                 return self.event.style
00498         if not self.event.style or self.event.style == '\'':
00499             if (self.analysis.allow_single_quoted and
00500                     not (self.simple_key_context and self.analysis.multiline)):
00501                 return '\''
00502         return '"'
00503 
00504     def process_scalar(self):
00505         if self.analysis is None:
00506             self.analysis = self.analyze_scalar(self.event.value)
00507         if self.style is None:
00508             self.style = self.choose_scalar_style()
00509         split = (not self.simple_key_context)
00510         #if self.analysis.multiline and split    \
00511         #        and (not self.style or self.style in '\'\"'):
00512         #    self.write_indent()
00513         if self.style == '"':
00514             self.write_double_quoted(self.analysis.scalar, split)
00515         elif self.style == '\'':
00516             self.write_single_quoted(self.analysis.scalar, split)
00517         elif self.style == '>':
00518             self.write_folded(self.analysis.scalar)
00519         elif self.style == '|':
00520             self.write_literal(self.analysis.scalar)
00521         else:
00522             self.write_plain(self.analysis.scalar, split)
00523         self.analysis = None
00524         self.style = None
00525 
00526     # Analyzers.
00527 
00528     def prepare_version(self, version):
00529         major, minor = version
00530         if major != 1:
00531             raise EmitterError("unsupported YAML version: %d.%d" % (major, minor))
00532         return u'%d.%d' % (major, minor)
00533 
00534     def prepare_tag_handle(self, handle):
00535         if not handle:
00536             raise EmitterError("tag handle must not be empty")
00537         if handle[0] != u'!' or handle[-1] != u'!':
00538             raise EmitterError("tag handle must start and end with '!': %r"
00539                     % (handle.encode('utf-8')))
00540         for ch in handle[1:-1]:
00541             if not (u'0' <= ch <= u'9' or u'A' <= ch <= 'Z' or u'a' <= ch <= 'z'    \
00542                     or ch in u'-_'):
00543                 raise EmitterError("invalid character %r in the tag handle: %r"
00544                         % (ch.encode('utf-8'), handle.encode('utf-8')))
00545         return handle
00546 
00547     def prepare_tag_prefix(self, prefix):
00548         if not prefix:
00549             raise EmitterError("tag prefix must not be empty")
00550         chunks = []
00551         start = end = 0
00552         if prefix[0] == u'!':
00553             end = 1
00554         while end < len(prefix):
00555             ch = prefix[end]
00556             if u'0' <= ch <= u'9' or u'A' <= ch <= 'Z' or u'a' <= ch <= 'z'  \
00557                     or ch in u'-;/?!:@&=+$,_.~*\'()[]':
00558                 end += 1
00559             else:
00560                 if start < end:
00561                     chunks.append(prefix[start:end])
00562                 start = end = end+1
00563                 data = ch.encode('utf-8')
00564                 for ch in data:
00565                     chunks.append(u'%%%02X' % ord(ch))
00566         if start < end:
00567             chunks.append(prefix[start:end])
00568         return u''.join(chunks)
00569 
00570     def prepare_tag(self, tag):
00571         if not tag:
00572             raise EmitterError("tag must not be empty")
00573         if tag == u'!':
00574             return tag
00575         handle = None
00576         suffix = tag
00577         for prefix in self.tag_prefixes:
00578             if tag.startswith(prefix)   \
00579                     and (prefix == u'!' or len(prefix) < len(tag)):
00580                 handle = self.tag_prefixes[prefix]
00581                 suffix = tag[len(prefix):]
00582         chunks = []
00583         start = end = 0
00584         while end < len(suffix):
00585             ch = suffix[end]
00586             if u'0' <= ch <= u'9' or u'A' <= ch <= 'Z' or u'a' <= ch <= 'z'  \
00587                     or ch in u'-;/?:@&=+$,_.~*\'()[]'   \
00588                     or (ch == u'!' and handle != u'!'):
00589                 end += 1
00590             else:
00591                 if start < end:
00592                     chunks.append(suffix[start:end])
00593                 start = end = end+1
00594                 data = ch.encode('utf-8')
00595                 for ch in data:
00596                     chunks.append(u'%%%02X' % ord(ch))
00597         if start < end:
00598             chunks.append(suffix[start:end])
00599         suffix_text = u''.join(chunks)
00600         if handle:
00601             return u'%s%s' % (handle, suffix_text)
00602         else:
00603             return u'!<%s>' % suffix_text
00604 
00605     def prepare_anchor(self, anchor):
00606         if not anchor:
00607             raise EmitterError("anchor must not be empty")
00608         for ch in anchor:
00609             if not (u'0' <= ch <= u'9' or u'A' <= ch <= 'Z' or u'a' <= ch <= 'z'    \
00610                     or ch in u'-_'):
00611                 raise EmitterError("invalid character %r in the anchor: %r"
00612                         % (ch.encode('utf-8'), anchor.encode('utf-8')))
00613         return anchor
00614 
00615     def analyze_scalar(self, scalar):
00616 
00617         # Empty scalar is a special case.
00618         if not scalar:
00619             return ScalarAnalysis(scalar=scalar, empty=True, multiline=False,
00620                     allow_flow_plain=False, allow_block_plain=True,
00621                     allow_single_quoted=True, allow_double_quoted=True,
00622                     allow_block=False)
00623 
00624         # Indicators and special characters.
00625         block_indicators = False
00626         flow_indicators = False
00627         line_breaks = False
00628         special_characters = False
00629 
00630         # Whitespaces.
00631         inline_spaces = False          # non-space space+ non-space
00632         inline_breaks = False          # non-space break+ non-space
00633         leading_spaces = False         # ^ space+ (non-space | $)
00634         leading_breaks = False         # ^ break+ (non-space | $)
00635         trailing_spaces = False        # (^ | non-space) space+ $
00636         trailing_breaks = False        # (^ | non-space) break+ $
00637         inline_breaks_spaces = False   # non-space break+ space+ non-space
00638         mixed_breaks_spaces = False    # anything else
00639 
00640         # Check document indicators.
00641         if scalar.startswith(u'---') or scalar.startswith(u'...'):
00642             block_indicators = True
00643             flow_indicators = True
00644 
00645         # First character or preceded by a whitespace.
00646         preceeded_by_space = True
00647 
00648         # Last character or followed by a whitespace.
00649         followed_by_space = (len(scalar) == 1 or
00650                 scalar[1] in u'\0 \t\r\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
00651 
00652         # The current series of whitespaces contain plain spaces.
00653         spaces = False
00654 
00655         # The current series of whitespaces contain line breaks.
00656         breaks = False
00657 
00658         # The current series of whitespaces contain a space followed by a
00659         # break.
00660         mixed = False
00661 
00662         # The current series of whitespaces start at the beginning of the
00663         # scalar.
00664         leading = False
00665 
00666         index = 0
00667         while index < len(scalar):
00668             ch = scalar[index]
00669 
00670             # Check for indicators.
00671 
00672             if index == 0:
00673                 # Leading indicators are special characters.
00674                 if ch in u'#,[]{}&*!|>\'\"%@`': 
00675                     flow_indicators = True
00676                     block_indicators = True
00677                 if ch in u'?:':
00678                     flow_indicators = True
00679                     if followed_by_space:
00680                         block_indicators = True
00681                 if ch == u'-' and followed_by_space:
00682                     flow_indicators = True
00683                     block_indicators = True
00684             else:
00685                 # Some indicators cannot appear within a scalar as well.
00686                 if ch in u',?[]{}':
00687                     flow_indicators = True
00688                 if ch == u':':
00689                     flow_indicators = True
00690                     if followed_by_space:
00691                         block_indicators = True
00692                 if ch == u'#' and preceeded_by_space:
00693                     flow_indicators = True
00694                     block_indicators = True
00695 
00696             # Check for line breaks, special, and unicode characters.
00697 
00698             if ch in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
00699                 line_breaks = True
00700             if not (ch == u'\n' or u'\x20' <= ch <= u'\x7E'):
00701                 if (ch == u'\x85' or u'\xA0' <= ch <= u'\uD7FF'
00702                         or u'\uE000' <= ch <= u'\uFFFD') and ch != u'\uFEFF':
00703                     unicode_characters = True
00704                     if not self.allow_unicode:
00705                         special_characters = True
00706                 else:
00707                     special_characters = True
00708 
00709             # Spaces, line breaks, and how they are mixed. State machine.
00710 
00711             # Start or continue series of whitespaces.
00712             if ch in u' \n\x85\u2028\u2029':
00713                 if spaces and breaks:
00714                     if ch != u' ':      # break+ (space+ break+)    => mixed
00715                         mixed = True
00716                 elif spaces:
00717                     if ch != u' ':      # (space+ break+)   => mixed
00718                         breaks = True
00719                         mixed = True
00720                 elif breaks:
00721                     if ch == u' ':      # break+ space+
00722                         spaces = True
00723                 else:
00724                     leading = (index == 0)
00725                     if ch == u' ':      # space+
00726                         spaces = True
00727                     else:               # break+
00728                         breaks = True
00729 
00730             # Series of whitespaces ended with a non-space.
00731             elif spaces or breaks:
00732                 if leading:
00733                     if spaces and breaks:
00734                         mixed_breaks_spaces = True
00735                     elif spaces:
00736                         leading_spaces = True
00737                     elif breaks:
00738                         leading_breaks = True
00739                 else:
00740                     if mixed:
00741                         mixed_breaks_spaces = True
00742                     elif spaces and breaks:
00743                         inline_breaks_spaces = True
00744                     elif spaces:
00745                         inline_spaces = True
00746                     elif breaks:
00747                         inline_breaks = True
00748                 spaces = breaks = mixed = leading = False
00749 
00750             # Series of whitespaces reach the end.
00751             if (spaces or breaks) and (index == len(scalar)-1):
00752                 if spaces and breaks:
00753                     mixed_breaks_spaces = True
00754                 elif spaces:
00755                     trailing_spaces = True
00756                     if leading:
00757                         leading_spaces = True
00758                 elif breaks:
00759                     trailing_breaks = True
00760                     if leading:
00761                         leading_breaks = True
00762                 spaces = breaks = mixed = leading = False
00763 
00764             # Prepare for the next character.
00765             index += 1
00766             preceeded_by_space = (ch in u'\0 \t\r\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
00767             followed_by_space = (index+1 >= len(scalar) or
00768                     scalar[index+1] in u'\0 \t\r\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
00769 
00770         # Let's decide what styles are allowed.
00771         allow_flow_plain = True
00772         allow_block_plain = True
00773         allow_single_quoted = True
00774         allow_double_quoted = True
00775         allow_block = True
00776 
00777         # Leading and trailing whitespace are bad for plain scalars. We also
00778         # do not want to mess with leading whitespaces for block scalars.
00779         if leading_spaces or leading_breaks or trailing_spaces:
00780             allow_flow_plain = allow_block_plain = allow_block = False
00781 
00782         # Trailing breaks are fine for block scalars, but unacceptable for
00783         # plain scalars.
00784         if trailing_breaks:
00785             allow_flow_plain = allow_block_plain = False
00786 
00787         # The combination of (space+ break+) is only acceptable for block
00788         # scalars.
00789         if inline_breaks_spaces:
00790             allow_flow_plain = allow_block_plain = allow_single_quoted = False
00791 
00792         # Mixed spaces and breaks, as well as special character are only
00793         # allowed for double quoted scalars.
00794         if mixed_breaks_spaces or special_characters:
00795             allow_flow_plain = allow_block_plain =  \
00796             allow_single_quoted = allow_block = False
00797 
00798         # We don't emit multiline plain scalars.
00799         if line_breaks:
00800             allow_flow_plain = allow_block_plain = False
00801 
00802         # Flow indicators are forbidden for flow plain scalars.
00803         if flow_indicators:
00804             allow_flow_plain = False
00805 
00806         # Block indicators are forbidden for block plain scalars.
00807         if block_indicators:
00808             allow_block_plain = False
00809 
00810         return ScalarAnalysis(scalar=scalar,
00811                 empty=False, multiline=line_breaks,
00812                 allow_flow_plain=allow_flow_plain,
00813                 allow_block_plain=allow_block_plain,
00814                 allow_single_quoted=allow_single_quoted,
00815                 allow_double_quoted=allow_double_quoted,
00816                 allow_block=allow_block)
00817 
00818     # Writers.
00819 
00820     def flush_stream(self):
00821         if hasattr(self.stream, 'flush'):
00822             self.stream.flush()
00823 
00824     def write_stream_start(self):
00825         # Write BOM if needed.
00826         if self.encoding and self.encoding.startswith('utf-16'):
00827             self.stream.write(u'\xFF\xFE'.encode(self.encoding))
00828 
00829     def write_stream_end(self):
00830         self.flush_stream()
00831 
00832     def write_indicator(self, indicator, need_whitespace,
00833             whitespace=False, indention=False):
00834         if self.whitespace or not need_whitespace:
00835             data = indicator
00836         else:
00837             data = u' '+indicator
00838         self.whitespace = whitespace
00839         self.indention = self.indention and indention
00840         self.column += len(data)
00841         if self.encoding:
00842             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00843         self.stream.write(data)
00844 
00845     def write_indent(self):
00846         indent = self.indent or 0
00847         if not self.indention or self.column > indent   \
00848                 or (self.column == indent and not self.whitespace):
00849             self.write_line_break()
00850         if self.column < indent:
00851             self.whitespace = True
00852             data = u' '*(indent-self.column)
00853             self.column = indent
00854             if self.encoding:
00855                 data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00856             self.stream.write(data)
00857 
00858     def write_line_break(self, data=None):
00859         if data is None:
00860             data = self.best_line_break
00861         self.whitespace = True
00862         self.indention = True
00863         self.line += 1
00864         self.column = 0
00865         if self.encoding:
00866             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00867         self.stream.write(data)
00868 
00869     def write_version_directive(self, version_text):
00870         data = u'%%YAML %s' % version_text
00871         if self.encoding:
00872             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00873         self.stream.write(data)
00874         self.write_line_break()
00875 
00876     def write_tag_directive(self, handle_text, prefix_text):
00877         data = u'%%TAG %s %s' % (handle_text, prefix_text)
00878         if self.encoding:
00879             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00880         self.stream.write(data)
00881         self.write_line_break()
00882 
00883     # Scalar streams.
00884 
00885     def write_single_quoted(self, text, split=True):
00886         self.write_indicator(u'\'', True)
00887         spaces = False
00888         breaks = False
00889         start = end = 0
00890         while end <= len(text):
00891             ch = None
00892             if end < len(text):
00893                 ch = text[end]
00894             if spaces:
00895                 if ch is None or ch != u' ':
00896                     if start+1 == end and self.column > self.best_width and split   \
00897                             and start != 0 and end != len(text):
00898                         self.write_indent()
00899                     else:
00900                         data = text[start:end]
00901                         self.column += len(data)
00902                         if self.encoding:
00903                             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00904                         self.stream.write(data)
00905                     start = end
00906             elif breaks:
00907                 if ch is None or ch not in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
00908                     if text[start] == u'\n':
00909                         self.write_line_break()
00910                     for br in text[start:end]:
00911                         if br == u'\n':
00912                             self.write_line_break()
00913                         else:
00914                             self.write_line_break(br)
00915                     self.write_indent()
00916                     start = end
00917             else:
00918                 if ch is None or ch in u' \n\x85\u2028\u2029' or ch == u'\'':
00919                     if start < end:
00920                         data = text[start:end]
00921                         self.column += len(data)
00922                         if self.encoding:
00923                             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00924                         self.stream.write(data)
00925                         start = end
00926             if ch == u'\'':
00927                 data = u'\'\''
00928                 self.column += 2
00929                 if self.encoding:
00930                     data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00931                 self.stream.write(data)
00932                 start = end + 1
00933             if ch is not None:
00934                 spaces = (ch == u' ')
00935                 breaks = (ch in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
00936             end += 1
00937         self.write_indicator(u'\'', False)
00938 
00939     ESCAPE_REPLACEMENTS = {
00940         u'\0':      u'0',
00941         u'\x07':    u'a',
00942         u'\x08':    u'b',
00943         u'\x09':    u't',
00944         u'\x0A':    u'n',
00945         u'\x0B':    u'v',
00946         u'\x0C':    u'f',
00947         u'\x0D':    u'r',
00948         u'\x1B':    u'e',
00949         u'\"':      u'\"',
00950         u'\\':      u'\\',
00951         u'\x85':    u'N',
00952         u'\xA0':    u'_',
00953         u'\u2028':  u'L',
00954         u'\u2029':  u'P',
00955     }
00956 
00957     def write_double_quoted(self, text, split=True):
00958         self.write_indicator(u'"', True)
00959         start = end = 0
00960         while end <= len(text):
00961             ch = None
00962             if end < len(text):
00963                 ch = text[end]
00964             if ch is None or ch in u'"\\\x85\u2028\u2029\uFEFF' \
00965                     or not (u'\x20' <= ch <= u'\x7E'
00966                         or (self.allow_unicode
00967                             and (u'\xA0' <= ch <= u'\uD7FF'
00968                                 or u'\uE000' <= ch <= u'\uFFFD'))):
00969                 if start < end:
00970                     data = text[start:end]
00971                     self.column += len(data)
00972                     if self.encoding:
00973                         data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00974                     self.stream.write(data)
00975                     start = end
00976                 if ch is not None:
00977                     if ch in self.ESCAPE_REPLACEMENTS:
00978                         data = u'\\'+self.ESCAPE_REPLACEMENTS[ch]
00979                     elif ch <= u'\xFF':
00980                         data = u'\\x%02X' % ord(ch)
00981                     elif ch <= u'\uFFFF':
00982                         data = u'\\u%04X' % ord(ch)
00983                     else:
00984                         data = u'\\U%08X' % ord(ch)
00985                     self.column += len(data)
00986                     if self.encoding:
00987                         data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00988                     self.stream.write(data)
00989                     start = end+1
00990             if 0 < end < len(text)-1 and (ch == u' ' or start >= end)   \
00991                     and self.column+(end-start) > self.best_width and split:
00992                 data = text[start:end]+u'\\'
00993                 if start < end:
00994                     start = end
00995                 self.column += len(data)
00996                 if self.encoding:
00997                     data = data.encode(self.encoding)
00998                 self.stream.write(data)
00999                 self.write_indent()
01000                 self.whitespace = False
01001                 self.indention = False
01002                 if text[start] == u' ':
01003                     data = u'\\'
01004                     self.column += len(data)
01005                     if self.encoding:
01006                         data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01007                     self.stream.write(data)
01008             end += 1
01009         self.write_indicator(u'"', False)
01010 
01011     def determine_chomp(self, text):
01012         tail = text[-2:]
01013         while len(tail) < 2:
01014             tail = u' '+tail
01015         if tail[-1] in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01016             if tail[-2] in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01017                 return u'+'
01018             else:
01019                 return u''
01020         else:
01021             return u'-'
01022 
01023     def write_folded(self, text):
01024         chomp = self.determine_chomp(text)
01025         self.write_indicator(u'>'+chomp, True)
01026         self.write_indent()
01027         leading_space = False
01028         spaces = False
01029         breaks = False
01030         start = end = 0
01031         while end <= len(text):
01032             ch = None
01033             if end < len(text):
01034                 ch = text[end]
01035             if breaks:
01036                 if ch is None or ch not in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01037                     if not leading_space and ch is not None and ch != u' '  \
01038                             and text[start] == u'\n':
01039                         self.write_line_break()
01040                     leading_space = (ch == u' ')
01041                     for br in text[start:end]:
01042                         if br == u'\n':
01043                             self.write_line_break()
01044                         else:
01045                             self.write_line_break(br)
01046                     if ch is not None:
01047                         self.write_indent()
01048                     start = end
01049             elif spaces:
01050                 if ch != u' ':
01051                     if start+1 == end and self.column > self.best_width:
01052                         self.write_indent()
01053                     else:
01054                         data = text[start:end]
01055                         self.column += len(data)
01056                         if self.encoding:
01057                             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01058                         self.stream.write(data)
01059                     start = end
01060             else:
01061                 if ch is None or ch in u' \n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01062                     data = text[start:end]
01063                     if self.encoding:
01064                         data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01065                     self.stream.write(data)
01066                     if ch is None:
01067                         self.write_line_break()
01068                     start = end
01069             if ch is not None:
01070                 breaks = (ch in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
01071                 spaces = (ch == u' ')
01072             end += 1
01073 
01074     def write_literal(self, text):
01075         chomp = self.determine_chomp(text)
01076         self.write_indicator(u'|'+chomp, True)
01077         self.write_indent()
01078         breaks = False
01079         start = end = 0
01080         while end <= len(text):
01081             ch = None
01082             if end < len(text):
01083                 ch = text[end]
01084             if breaks:
01085                 if ch is None or ch not in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01086                     for br in text[start:end]:
01087                         if br == u'\n':
01088                             self.write_line_break()
01089                         else:
01090                             self.write_line_break(br)
01091                     if ch is not None:
01092                         self.write_indent()
01093                     start = end
01094             else:
01095                 if ch is None or ch in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01096                     data = text[start:end]
01097                     if self.encoding:
01098                         data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01099                     self.stream.write(data)
01100                     if ch is None:
01101                         self.write_line_break()
01102                     start = end
01103             if ch is not None:
01104                 breaks = (ch in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
01105             end += 1
01106 
01107     def write_plain(self, text, split=True):
01108         if not text:
01109             return
01110         if not self.whitespace:
01111             data = u' '
01112             self.column += len(data)
01113             if self.encoding:
01114                 data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01115             self.stream.write(data)
01116         self.writespace = False
01117         self.indention = False
01118         spaces = False
01119         breaks = False
01120         start = end = 0
01121         while end <= len(text):
01122             ch = None
01123             if end < len(text):
01124                 ch = text[end]
01125             if spaces:
01126                 if ch != u' ':
01127                     if start+1 == end and self.column > self.best_width and split:
01128                         self.write_indent()
01129                         self.writespace = False
01130                         self.indention = False
01131                     else:
01132                         data = text[start:end]
01133                         self.column += len(data)
01134                         if self.encoding:
01135                             data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01136                         self.stream.write(data)
01137                     start = end
01138             elif breaks:
01139                 if ch not in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01140                     if text[start] == u'\n':
01141                         self.write_line_break()
01142                     for br in text[start:end]:
01143                         if br == u'\n':
01144                             self.write_line_break()
01145                         else:
01146                             self.write_line_break(br)
01147                     self.write_indent()
01148                     self.whitespace = False
01149                     self.indention = False
01150                     start = end
01151             else:
01152                 if ch is None or ch in u' \n\x85\u2028\u2029':
01153                     data = text[start:end]
01154                     self.column += len(data)
01155                     if self.encoding:
01156                         data = data.encode(self.encoding)
01157                     self.stream.write(data)
01158                     start = end
01159             if ch is not None:
01160                 spaces = (ch == u' ')
01161                 breaks = (ch in u'\n\x85\u2028\u2029')
01162             end += 1
